hackathon-description-text: BullHacks is the Hackathon and Computing Society's annual hackathon, held at Birmingham City University.
hackathon-eligibility: Everyone who has a valid ticket for BullHacks 2.0 is eligible to participate.
hackathon-requirements: If you are entering the .tech or Majestic challenges, please mention this in both your Devpost submission, and your presentation.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: £100 Amazon vouchers to split between all team members
£60 Amazon voucher to split between all team members
£40 Amazon voucher to split between all team members

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=The Parkside Building, Curzon St, Birmingham B4 7XG, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: This prize will be awarded to the best overall hack.
This prize will be given to the runner up.
This prize will be given to the individual or team that, having come to their first hackathon or used a language they have never used before, has improved the most over the course of the event.
This prize is for the best use of a .tech domain! Make sure that you mention the URL of your hack in your submission and that the URL matches your team name.
This is the Majestic challenge award, for the best hack related to Unicorns!

hackathon-location-address: The Parkside Building, Curzon St, Birmingham B4 7XG, UK
hackathon-location-description: Curzon Building, City Centre Campus, Birmingham City University
